text: “ca pen pi di xyangri kæ mu chriki nthi ca mi sayya dı «n thi xallxh læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh di nxkcak brrda phu thi phwk cea di tha sayya wi thi xal-masyiddil ha rxm theanan dangnan trab dı thi phwk khea theiyngthrrm tx phwk cea k cng theiyngthrrm tx phwk khea thæ cring xallxh nan thrng chxb brrda phu thi khwam yakerng”
